name: Blistering Feint
text: Your foes flinch from the heat of your weapon, giving you an opportunity to slip past their defenses.
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on feint checks made while wielding a weapon that deals fire damage. Anytime you successfully feint a creature while using such a weapon, you may deal its fire damage to the enemy.
staminaText: When you attempt a feint while you’re wielding a weapon that deals fire damage, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to gain a bonus on the Bluff check equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你的敌人因为你高热的武器而退缩，这使得你获得了绕过他们防御的机会。
prerequisites_zh: 寓守于攻，精通虚招，火元素裔。
benefit_zh: 你使用能够造成火焰伤害的武器进行的虚招检定+2。每当你成功使用该武器对一名敌人进行虚招之后，就可以对其造成武器上的火焰伤害。
staminaText_zh: 当你尝试用造成火焰伤害的武器进行虚招时，你可以花费最多不超过5点耐力，你可以提升唬骗鉴定结果等同所耗费的耐力点。
